dmca.title: Copyright Infringement -- Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: anika@gothiclibrarian.net [mailto:anika@gothiclibrarian.net] 
Posted At: Thursday, June 08, 2006 5:46 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringement -- Cease and Desist
Subject: Copyright Infringement -- Cease and Desist


To Whom It May Concern:

I am the owner of http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net and all content
therein.

Your hosted site of http://www.pixeechuu.net has stolen multiple images
from my domain for the purposes of making icons to place and disseminate
on your servers.

I did not give permission for this and, in addition, my website has a
notice on copyright permissions that states that I do not allow for ANY
use of my images without explicit permission.

The offending website you are hosting is registered to:

Erin Waltman
4620 SE 42
Del City, OK 73115
US

Domain name: PIXEECHUU.NET

I have tried to send your user a cease and desist order to the email
address the site is registered to and it was returned as undeliverable.

Please remove the following images from your servers immediately.

1)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie12.gif
2)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie13.gif
3)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie14.gif
4)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie17.gif
5)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie19.gif
6)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie21.gif
7)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie23.gif
8)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie26.gif
9)  http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie30.gif
10) http://www.pixeechuu.net/GloMIcons/Gallery/Dollfie/dollfie32.gif

In the same order, these are the images which she stole to edit for the
above linked icons:

1)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/041804/7.jpg
2)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/041804/7.jpg
3)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/080203/1.jpg
4)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/031604/6.jpg
5)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/012004/5.jpg
6)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/031604b/8.jpg
7)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/083103/1.jpg
8)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/092103/1.jpg
9)  http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/032704/hotlinked2.jpg
10) http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net/gallery/042003/1.jpg

As stated previously, absolutely no content from
http://dream.gothiclibrarian.net is authorized for use by any party
other than myself, the site owner.

I affirm that this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, do state that this, the Complaining Party, is authorized to act
on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

I appreciate your immediate attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
~Anika Williams
